title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama API.

title: langchain-community/llms/ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama as an LLM for chains, agents, RAG, and more.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI) with multi-model convos, file uploads, RAG, admin panel.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to run and chat with Ollama models inside your editor; generate code, refactor, or ask questions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for code completion.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI for chatting, managing models, and batch scripting with Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU/node-selector support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CUDA, ROCm, CPU) and compose examples for running Ollama in Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama providing sync/async APIs, streaming, and embeddings support.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate offering strongly-typed, async/await bindings to the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with chat, completions, and embeddings; supports streaming and dependency injection.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB to chat with your documents offline.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that answers questions and generates images (via SD) powered by a local Ollama backend.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts against selected notes and insert results back into your vault.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack by deepset integration enabling Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that uses Ollama to answer questions in channels/DMs with optional thread summarization.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: PyPI page for the official ollama Python package (install via pip) with quick-start examples and version history.

title: ollama-npm
summary: npm page for the official ollama JS package; includes TypeScript types and usage snippets for Node & Edge runtimes.
